participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Resilient and determined, she finds joy in sports and values hard work.
participant_1.background: i love playing softball. my father is in the army. i recently was fired and had to get a new job. my mom passed away when i was young. i work in the insurance business.

participant_2.name: Carlos
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate, he loves expressing himself through music and language.
participant_2.background: i am a musician. i also study languages. my favorite spanish word is trabajo. one of the languages that i am currently studying is spanish.
